Body:
Welcome back to the company, hope your vacation was nice. We have updated our operating system, so we have a few things to go over.

There are a few new systems we have ready, but we'll be rolling them out as time goes on. As of now, we need you to make some decisions for company. Over the next couple of quarters we will start implementing our new systems for you to use.

Great to have you back!

We've implemented a new system on your machine. You can now choose which mechs Botnet should develop based on the blueprints that our Design team has drafted up. For now, we'll handle the selling of the mechs.
We added another system to your machine. You can now sell the mechs that Botnet has developed to the countries of your choosing.

SubjectLine: Mech upgrades. You can do them
